alert.note: Alert for Hinds; Warren (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 17 at 5:33PM CDT until April 17 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Warren County in west central Mississippi... Northwestern Hinds County in central Mississippi... * Until 630 PM CDT. * At 533 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Redwood, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Bovina and Oak Ridge around 550 PM CDT. Flowers and Youngton around 555 PM CDT. Edwards around 600 PM CDT. Brownsville around 610 PM CDT. Bolton around 615 PM CDT. Raymond around 620 PM CDT. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
